channel.title: Own a part of Gewnscape!
channel.description:
Hello, For a long long time ive been thinking of making a server called gewnscape. Now im ready to put that plan to work. But I love to shop on Runescape so I thought why not let other people "make their own shop". So with reading what this section of the forum is about I thought both you and me would enjoy letting you have your own shop in Gewnscape.
If you would like a shop of your own in gewnscape please fill out the form below.
Your Characters Main Name: Shop NPC you want: Location of Shop: Shop Specialty: Other details/questions:
Example: Your Characters Main Name: Monkeyman Shop NPC you want: Betty Location of Shop: Catherby Fishing store(Fish)/The Cooking Guild(bakers) Shop Specialty: Raw Fish If specialty not available: Baker Items Other details/questions: If its raw fish please put fishing equiptment also, If bakery please put Jugs of Water, Pots, and Pots of Flour.
Also if you want, PM me and ill let you know when your shops ready and when gewnscape is out.
EDIT: P.S. Please post your application here not PM me.

item.title: Own a part of Gewnscape!
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

Cyph:

"Show off what you have done, help with errors and so forth. " Also may I remind you, Your “Non-Advertising” rune thing also falls into this catergory, and if youd like to say “But you have developed anything yet” id like to also point out this section of the forums is called “Server DEVELOPMENT / help” Not “Server Development help” so… Obviously its for development too.

So basically your saying I have a topic against the rules?
The the rules again.
Show off your server.
That is what I am doing by not advertising and not asking for developers.

Read full topic

item.title: Own a part of Gewnscape!
item.dc:creator: @Cyph Cyph
item.description:
@Cyph wrote:

Hello, For a long long time ive been thinking of making a server called gewnscape. Now im ready to put that plan to work. But I love to shop on Runescape so I thought why not let other people “make their own shop”. So with reading what this section of the forum is about I thought both you and me would enjoy letting you have your own shop in Gewnscape.

If you would like a shop of your own in gewnscape please fill out the form below.

Your Characters Main Name:
Shop NPC you want:
Location of Shop:
Shop Specialty:
Other details/questions:

Example:
Your Characters Main Name: Monkeyman
Shop NPC you want: Betty
Location of Shop: Catherby Fishing store(Fish)/The Cooking Guild(bakers)
Shop Specialty: Raw Fish
If specialty not available: Baker Items
Other details/questions: If its raw fish please put fishing equiptment also, If bakery please put Jugs of Water, Pots, and Pots of Flour.

Also if you want, PM me and ill let you know when your shops ready and when gewnscape is out.

EDIT: P.S. Please post your application here not PM me.

Read full topic
